text:
Travel Articles | August 4, 2015 
Agra and Mathura are two historical cities of India and are also two of the most visited tourist destination of Inda. Both the cities have earned a world wide fame for its tourist attractions. Taxi hiring and cab booking services are available 24 X 7 in these places. Let's have an insight of these cities in refernce with availability of car rental options to roam around. 
India is land where myths were woven into the history with pinch of true events. The heritage city Agra and religious city Mathura are two such cities of India. The most fascinating thing about visiting these two cities is that no one can hate these cities and also could never fall short of stories after been traveled there. The Agra and Mathura stands widely famous for entirely two different reasons, yet somehow you will feel the connection between these two cities. While Agra reflects the glory and grandeur of the bygone Mughal days who have ruled over India for almost three centuries, Mathura has been teaching the true meaning of love and faith to the world incorporating the devotion for Radha and Krishna in their daily routine. The fame of these two cities can be figured with the fact that out of the total foreign tourists who visits Uttar Pradesh, approximately 35-40% of them visits these two cities only. Thatâ€™s only a rough figure. And both the cities receive the large number of foreign tourists every year. Some of them visit Agra to absorb the beauty and magnificence of Taj Mahal while some of them visit Mathura to learn more about the Hinduism and Lord Krishna. Being such a widely famed tourist place, several industries are flourishing in these cities including tourism, hotel industry and car rental services. This article is an endeavor to list out the tourist destinations of Agra and Mathura while discussing the availability of cab booking and taxi services in the said place. 
Taxi Hiring Services near the tourist destinations of Agra 
Agra is one of the ancient cities of India and has been the prominent seat of Mughal dynasty throughout their reign. Since then this city has been the mute spectator of all the major and minor events that took place in this city. There are lots of historical monuments in this city which attracts hordes of tourists every year including one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Taj Mahal, built the white marbles and perhaps the one and only epitome of love the world has ever seen. Apart from that, Agra Fort is one of world heritage site which was built by Zalaluddin Mohammad Akbar, the greatest king of Mughal dynasty. Both of them are situated in the close proximity to each other and cab booking services are easily available to visit these monuments. And then there are Jama Masjid, Meena Bazaar, Chini ka Rauza, Guru ka Taal etc. The best way to travel and have a good view of whole city is to hire a cab from online car Rental Company over the internet. These car rental companies provide 24 X 7 cab booking and taxi hiring services in Agra. 
Cab Booking Facilities near the tourist destinations of Mathura 
Mathura is a city which is cent percent dedicated to Lord Krishna. Every temple, every school, every hotels are named after Radha and Krishna the two widely worshipped deities of Hindu mythology. As per the legend, Mathura is a place where Lord Krishna has spent his childhood with Radha and other friends of Mathura and Vrindavan. Barsana, a small village of Vrindavan region is considered to be the birth place of Radha, beloved of Lord Krishna. Mathura is just 145 kms away from the national capital Delhi and approximately 60 kms from Agra. Taxi services are available all the time to travel between these two places. The major tourist attraction in and around Mathura are Iskcon Temple, Prem Mandir, lord Krishna birth place, Barsana, Govardhan, Gokul, Nandgaon and Yamuna Ghat.
